title: Digital Bonfire
lyrics:
Title:  Digital Bonfire
(Verse 1)
Phone screen glowin', midnight blue
Thumb scrollin', lookin' for you
Comments flyin', hearts on fire
Feedin' the flame, takin' it higher
This ain't a game, this ain't pretend
This digital bonfire, it never ends
Pourin' my soul out, line by line
Hopin' your heart catches mine
(Chorus)
Burnin' it up, burnin' it bright
Underneath the digital light
Every word a spark, every song a flame
Playin' with fire, callin' your name
This digital bonfire, reachin' for the sky
Let the embers fly, let the feelings ride high
(Verse 2)
Strumming my guitar, singin' my truth
Spillin' the secrets of my restless youth
Layin' it bare for the world to see
Hopin' you're watchin', hopin' you're with me
This concrete jungle, a lonely place
But in this moment, I find my grace
Connectin' with souls, across the miles
Tradin' our stories, sharin' our smiles
(Bridge)
They say it's fake, they say it's a show
But the heat I feel, down deep I know
It's real as the tears I cry in the night
Real as the dreams that take flight
This digital world, it ain't all bad
It's where I found the love I never had
(Chorus)
Burnin' it up, burnin' it bright
Underneath the digital light
Every word a spark, every song a flame
Playin' with fire, callin' your name
This digital bonfire, reachin' for the sky
Let the embers fly, let the feelings ride high
(Outro)
So log on in, gather 'round the screen
Let the digital bonfire burn bright and keen
Yeah, let it burn.
